CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Birthdate),
'',
IF( And( Month(Today()) >= Month(Birthdate), Day(Today()) >= Day(Birthdate) ),
TEXT(Year(Today())- Year(Birthdate)) & " " & "years" & " " & TEXT(Month(Today())-Month(Birthdate)) & " " & "months" & " " & TEXT(Day(Today())-Day(Birthdate)),
IF( And(month(Today())< month(Birthdate), Day(Today())>= Day(Birthdate)),
TEXT(Year(Today())-Year(Birthdate)-1) & " " & "years" & " " & TEXT(12 - Month(Birthdate)+month(Today())) & " " & "months" & " " & TEXT(Day(Today())-Day(Birthdate)),
if( And( month(Today())< month(Birthdate), Day(Today())< Day(Birthdate)),
(TEXT( (Year(Today())-Year(Birthdate)-1)) & " " & "years" & " " & TEXT((12 - Month(Birthdate)+month(Today())-1)) & " " & "months" ) & " " & CASE(month(Birthdate), 2, TEXT( (28 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 4, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 6, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 9, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 11, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), TEXT( (31 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())) ), if( And( month(Today())= month(Birthdate), Day(Today())< Day(Birthdate)),
(TEXT(Year(Today())- Year(Birthdate)-1)) & " " & "years" & " " & "11" & " " & "months" & " " & CASE(month(Birthdate), 2, TEXT( (28 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 4, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 6, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 9, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 11, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), TEXT( (31 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())) ), (TEXT(Year(Today())- Year(Birthdate))) & " " & "years" & " " & TEXT(Month(Today())-Month(Birthdate)-1) & " " & "months" & " " & CASE(month(Birthdate), 2, TEXT( (28 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 4, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 6, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 9, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), 11, TEXT( (30 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())), TEXT( (31 - Day(Birthdate))+ Day(Today())) ) ) ) ) ) & " " & "days" )
